metadata.description: Scalekit authentication skills for building secure auth, SSO, MCP auth, SCIM provisioning, and agent auth flows.

plugins.name: dryrun
plugins.description: Quickly test Scalekit authentication setup end-to-end before writing integration code using the dryrun tool.

plugins.name: agent-auth
plugins.description: Implements Scalekit Agent Auth so AI agents can act in third-party apps (Gmail, Slack, Calendar, Notion) on behalf of users.

plugins.name: full-stack-auth
plugins.description: Production-ready authentication flows (sign-up, login, logout, sessions) using Scalekit full-stack auth across common stacks.

plugins.name: mcp-auth
plugins.description: OAuth 2.1 authorization for MCP servers using Scalekit to protect tools used by AI IDEs and agents.

plugins.name: modular-scim
plugins.description: SCIM webhook provisioning with Scalekit for real-time user and group lifecycle management.

plugins.name: modular-sso
plugins.description: Modular SSO flows using Scalekit for apps with existing user management, including IdP-initiated login and enterprise onboarding.
